articles.author: WSBTV.com News Staff
articles.title: Woman arrested for pouring gasoline, trying to burn down Martin Luther King Jr.’s birth home - WSB Atlanta
articles.description: Witnesses saw the woman pouring gas on the home and intervened, saving "an important part of American history."
articles.content:
ATLANTA — Atlanta police are investigating after a woman attempted to burn down Martin Luther King Jr.s birth home.
Police told Channel 2 Action News they were called to Kings birth home on Auburn A… [+2036 chars]
